title: Sign in
subtitle: Use the server ADMIN_API_TOKEN to access the admin console

form.tokenHelp: Paste the admin token that the server was started with. This is not a client token.
form.remember: Remember on this device (stores token in localStorage)

pill.info: Signed-in sessions can manage keys/tokens. Client tokens are for MCP clients and should never be used to sign into the admin console.

toast.tokenRequiredMessage: Paste the server ADMIN_API_TOKEN to sign in.
toast.authFailedMessage: Admin token is invalid. It must match the bridge server environment variable ADMIN_API_TOKEN.
toast.notFoundMessage: Check the Admin API base URL and ensure the bridge server exposes /admin/api/* routes.
toast.networkErrorMessage: Could not reach Admin API. In local dev, start bridge-server at http://127.0.0.1:8787 and rely on the Vite /admin proxy (leave base URL empty), or set base URL explicitly.
